title: Updating league wont allow me to log in.
body:
I joined a league game with some friends, and was receiving an error that wouldn't allow it to load so I decided to quickly restart my PC to hopefully allow me in game, when I tried to reload league it started updating, which is strange because I updated league about an hour earlier, so either I was really unlucky  or I'm doing the same update again. Also will I receive a penalty because of this, I don't feel as if it's my fault at all that I'm unable to enter game for the first 10-15 mins. Has anyone else run into this before?

EDIT: Now the update is complete and it's telling me my username/password in incorrect. Any help would be appreciated.

EDIT2: I restarted client again and now it's updating again...

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?
